nodes.text: Chad was a planet located in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories that was the homeworld of the sentient Chadra-Fan species. A blue dressing known as Chadian dressing was from this world.

Chad was first mentioned in Galaxy Guide 4: Alien Races, a 1989 Star Wars Legends sourcebook written by Troy Denning for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The planet became canon when it was mentioned in the Databank entry for the Chadra-Fan species that was published on StarWars.com.
